sentences: Iidsete pärast tundus kodus rõõmus ja lemmekuldne.
Ta armas iidsete ja aitas meeldivalt koduhooneks muuta.
Iidsete hääletusega valiti linnavolikogu uueks esimeheks.
context: The word 'iidsete' in Estonian refers to rugs or rug-like items, and can also be used metaphorically to describe something that is spread out or arranged similarly to a rug. It is commonly used in contexts related to home decor or voting processes.
